languages.text: "Методы Чорда были жестоки, но цель — праведной. Отныне Футфол станет обителью веры и благочестия. Контроль за соблюдением законов Империума будет ужесточен".

traits.locale_text: "Методы Чорда были жестоки, но цель — праведной. Отныне Футфол станет обителью веры и благочестия. Контроль за соблюдением законов Империума будет ужесточен".

languages.text: "Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."
languages.original_text: "Методы Чорда были жестоки, но цель — праведной. Отныне Футфол станет обителью веры и благочестия. Контроль за соблюдением законов Империума будет ужесточен".

traits.locale_text: "Chorda's methods were cruel but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be an abode of faith and piety. Control over the observance of the Imperium's laws will be tightened."
"Chorda's methods were cruel but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be an abode of faith and piety. Control over the observance of the Imperium's laws will be tightened."
"Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be an abode of faith and piety. Control over the observance of the Imperium's laws will be tightened."
"Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be an abode of faith and piety. Control over the observance of the Imperium's laws will be tightened."
"Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."
"Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."

languages.text: “虽然库尔达的手段很残忍，但她的愿景却是正义的。从今天开始，落脚港要成为信仰与虔诚的堡垒，要更加严格地遵守帝国的律法。”
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."

traits.locale_text: “虽然库尔达的手段很残忍，但她的愿景却是正义的。从今天开始，落脚港要成为信仰与虔诚的居所，要更加严格地遵守帝国的律法。”

languages.text: 「チョーダのやり方は残酷だが、その目的は正義だった。これからのフットフォールは信仰と敬虔の砦となる。帝国法律の遵守に対する統制は、より厳しく監視されるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダのやり方は残酷だが、その目的は正義だった。これからのフットフォールは信仰と敬虔の砦となる。帝国法律の遵守に対する統制は、より厳しく監視されるだろう」

languages.text: «Los métodos de Chorda eran crueles, pero su objetivo era justo. De ahora en adelante Paso será un bastión de fe y piedad. Se reforzará la vigilancia sobre el cumplimiento de las leyes del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."

traits.locale_text: «Los métodos de Chorda eran crueles, pero su objetivo era justo. De ahora en adelante Paso será una morada de fe y piedad. El control sobre el cumplimiento de las leyes del Imperium será más estricto».

languages.text: "Chordas Methoden waren grauenhaft, doch ihr Ziel war rechtschaffen. Von nun an wird Footfall eine Bastion des Glaubens und der Frömmigkeit sein. Die Einhaltung der Gesetze des Imperiums wird in Zukunft strenger überwacht."
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."

traits.locale_text: "Chordas Methoden waren grauenhaft, doch ihr Ziel war rechtschaffen. Von nun an wird Footfall ein Ort des Glaubens und der Frömmigkeit sein. Die Einhaltung der Gesetze des Imperiums wird in Zukunft strenger überwacht."

languages.text: « Chorda employait des méthodes cruelles, mais son objectif était légitime. Désormais, Castel sera un bastion de foi et de piété. Nous allons renforcer le contrôle du respect des lois de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."

traits.locale_text: « Chorda employait des méthodes cruelles, mais son objectif était légitime. Désormais, Castel sera un havre de foi et de piété. Nous allons renforcer le contrôle du respect des lois de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Chorda'nın metotları zalimceydi ancak doğru bir amaç güdüyordu. Bu andan itibaren Binliman, bir inanç ve din merkezi olacak. İmparatorluk'un kanunlarına uyulup uyulmadığı çok yakından denetlenecek."
languages.original_text: "Chorda's methods were cruel, but her goal was righteous. From now on, Footfall will be a bastion of faith and piety. Observance of the Imperium's laws will be monitored more closely."

traits.locale_text: "Chorda'nın metotları zalimceydi ancak doğru bir amaç güdüyordu. Bu andan itibaren Binliman bir inanç ve din merkezi olacak. İmparatorluk'un kanunlarına uyulup uyulmadığı çok yakından denetlenecek."
